/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban architecture. Cars and trucks are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
